content: Wednesday 9 July 2014 05.51 EDT	How do you define social work? Reader responses	Two international social work bodies are preparing to vote on a new global definition of the profession, but what do you think? • What is social work?	This week the International Federation of Social Workers and the International Association of Schools of Social Work are voting on a proposed new definition of social work.; If accepted, the definition will globally represent what social work is.; Here are some alternative explanations of what social work is, from people who work in the sector.; If you have your own definition, add it in the comments below or tweet us @GdnSocialCare.
name: guardian-2014-h-157
